topic.title: Actions Available in the Markdown Editor

body.p: A variety of actions are available in the Markdown editor, on the toolbar, from the contextual menu, and in the Document menu.

section.title: Toolbar Actions
section.p: The following default actions are readily available on the toolbar when editing Markdown documents:

dlentry.dd: Surrounds the selected text with a bold tag. You can use this action on multiple non-contiguous selections.
